sentences.sContent: Occasionally people confess to crimes they haven’t committed just to get attention.
sentences.sCn: 偶尔人们会承认自己并未犯过的罪行，那只是为了引人注意。

sentences.sContent: Torture was used and Fian confessed.
sentences.sCn: 酷刑用过之后菲安就招供了。

sentences.sContent: Marsha confessed that she didn’t really know how to work the computer.
sentences.sCn: 玛莎承认自己其实并不会使用计算机。

remMethod.val: con(全部) ＋ fess(说) → 全部说出 → 承认； 坦白

words.tran: 公开承认地；明白供认地；自称地
忏悔者；为信教而被迫害的教徒

trans.tranOther: to admit, especially to the police, that you have done something wrong or illegal
